org.apache.polygene.library.restlet

Class PolygeneRestApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • org.restlet.Application
        • org.apache.polygene.library.restlet.PolygeneRestApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

    public abstract class PolygeneRestApplication
extends org.restlet.Application
    This class is generic enough to be promoted to Polygene's Restlet Library
